html:
1.30.18  6:11 pm   1.28.18  9:49 pm HOW DID THEY KNOW

     i guess that person has gotten to know me pretty well

1.30.18  6:08 pm   From the reality videos i saw that you've been stuck in the middle of doing long videos and short videos. i love the duration of your newer content Bill. it seems that you've found the balance. Will you continue on doing these avarage length videos? Or will 6-30 sec videos come back?

     hopefully without jinxing it by saying it here, i am making another attempt at having a video release every 2 weeks, every other tuesday. i attempted to do this last october, but i thought i was going to alternate between songs and non-songs. the failure of this was that a full 3+ minute song, with video, can not be done in 2 weeks. i wanted to believe it could be done, but it just can't. so this time, i am not guaranteeing any 3+ minute songs to be completed in less than 2 weeks, but instead, i am going to try to compromise and write the videos a little bit shorter (30 sec. if i have to) and also work on songs simultaneously. it's a terrible paradox because the songs need to be done as soon as possible. hopefully no one will see this, so i don't feel like a jerk again when i fail at the 2 week schedule again

1.30.18  6:08 pm   Everyone accidentally came to earth Bill ur not special 

     did i say i was

1.30.18  6:08 pm   How to spoon?

     i think there are some pamphlets about that

1.30.18  6:05 pm   How do you find meaning in a world that seems void of inherent, clear-cut purpose?

     stop trying to cut the meaning so clearly. recognize the liquidity of the meaning. and go swimming, in the meaning

1.30.18  6:03 pm   Why don't you follow anyone on instagram?

     i only use instagram to post

1.30.18  6:01 pm   You talk about how that's the way you like to live your life, now, what exactly is that way? 

     i think the only time i have ever used that phrase was in a video called 'i am steve' which was a fictional video, and that line relates to what came before it in the video

1.30.18  6:01 pm   Why are key signatures so annoying?

     maybe because you've never needed one. or maybe someone tried to teach you to use them before you needed it

1.30.18  5:55 pm   what do you think of rocks with plaid shirts?

     seems legit

1.30.18  5:54 pm   Is your new video supposed to be a parody of this questions page

     no, then there would have been a lot more spongebob quotes

1.30.18  5:52 pm   What do you work as?

     bill wurtz

1.30.18  5:51 pm   Do you make songs based off your life?

     sometimes

1.30.18  5:51 pm   do all of your videos have deeper meanings behind the surface and if so,

     i suppose anything can

      how's everyone doing at figuring them out?

     i haven't been following. i've been making more videos instead

1.30.18  5:49 pm   Did you use the previous question to make part of your video? The one that said, "why is everything so dumb and stupid? 

     the question was not asked until after the video was released. which would be 2 weeks after it was written

1.30.18  5:47 pm   why is it called a flight of stairs? shouldnt it be called a walk or run of stairs? My thought on the subject is that when stairs were invented (which was awhile ago) people had the ability of flying but then government became a thing and they didnt like the flying because as we all know people in the government cant fly and in a fit of jealously they stopped everyone from flying but left the name for the stairs leaving it as a flight of stairs. what are your thoughts on the matter?

     i think in the 1200s, going up stairs was the closest thing to flying we could really do

1.30.18  5:45 pm   have you tried reading out your answers here in a donald trump voice and did it make you chuckle

     that's how i always imagine them

1.30.18  5:44 pm   happy birthday

     thank you

1.30.18  5:44 pm   Is that a thing?

     is what a thing. nevermind, yes. everything is a thing, i just remembered

1.30.18  5:43 pm   Is everything stupid?

     yes, and smart

1.30.18  5:40 pm   Bill I have a concert tomorrow what shall I say to my peers to get them in the right frame of mind?

     are they performing too? or in the audience? giving concerts is hard when you know people in the audience

1.30.18  5:39 pm   if 2+2 has been 4 for so many darn years, how come it's a billion in this video: http://www.billwurtz.com/whats-2-plus-2.mp4 ?

     because that video is fiction

1.30.18  5:37 pm   is it me or do you like animating your characters more often now like in your just released video "maybe i could eat blades of grass"

     ever since history of the entire world i learned how to draw things in videos, and i've been doing it ever since

1.30.18  5:36 pm   What was the question that damien maymdien skipped in the latest video?

     the duck horse question

1.30.18  5:35 pm   Can you tell us more about damien maymdien?

     no

1.30.18  5:34 pm   what's your favorite type of cookie?

     the kind i implicitly consented to, without seemingly having done anything

1.30.18  5:31 pm   Why is your latest video titled 'maybe I could eat blades of grass' when it has nothing to do with the video 

     that is to throw you off the trail

1.30.18  5:29 pm   what made you write the song New Canaan (as someone who is from a town near New Canaan, CT)?

     traveling to new canaan

1.30.18  5:26 pm   what is your opinion on censoring art?

     some days u gotta just go in there and censor the hell out of some art

1.30.18  5:25 pm   how does a candle taste?

     it depends what flavour

1.30.18  5:25 pm   Where did you get that sombrero?

      1.29.18  2:34 pm

1.30.18  5:20 pm   I listen to you quite frequently on Spotify. Does doing this help you in any way, shape, or form? Is it so minimal that I should just shut up and buy your songs on iTunes? Would you prefer me to use one method of enjoying your music over another? 

     my favorite way is listening to sound files on a hard drive. it's the most reliable and user-friendly to me. you can do that if you want, or whatever way you prefer. if you want to give me money you can do that too

1.30.18  5:15 pm   how can you start finding the magic in everyday life again? because it seems i've lost it.

     try rotating it

1.30.18  5:13 pm   Can I have more backstory about "Believability Bob"?

     there is no backstory. he barely even has a body

1.30.18  5:13 pm   do you dislike people's expectations of you?

     luckily i don't really know what they are

1.30.18  5:13 pm   Damien, why is everything so dumb and stupid?

     ah, that is due to intelligence. please don't call me damien

1.30.18  5:12 pm   The world is stupid.

     yes, and smart

1.30.18  5:12 pm   Have you ever considered capital letters?

     yes

1.30.18  5:10 pm   how do you not creatively burn out and consistently come up with fresh new ideas?

     ideas grow on trees. i don't have any trees but luckily they can also be found on the floor, and ceiling

1.30.18  5:09 pm   Sometimes you seem a bit down...are you alright, bill?

     yes, are you

1.30.18  5:08 pm   Some of your songs or lines in your songs make it sound like you're going through a breakup,

     i am not

      are u ok

     yes, are you

1.30.18  5:08 pm   do you like tuesdays

     they are ok

1.30.18  5:07 pm   have you ever been flown by a bird?

     no, but i've been meaning to try it some time

1.30.18  5:07 pm   Why don't you write in the notebook page anymore? I personally find the entries there very thought provoking.

     i never wrote there. that is a place where i can upload things i have written previously

1.30.18  5:07 pm   why is everything so dumb and stupid?

     due to intelligence

1.30.18  4:41 pm   Do you have a tried and true process for writing lyrics?

     i never write lyrics non-musically

1.30.18  4:05 pm   how to be cool

      secret hint: everything is cool

1.30.18  4:04 pm   Have you ever written a song for someone in particular?

     i think so

      Do you plan to?

     yes

1.30.18  4:02 pm   What gives you hope?

     you

1.30.18  3:47 pm   How do you write your music? It seems really cool

     i just think of how i want it to go, and tell myself (and save me telling myself)

1.30.18  3:36 pm   How do you calm yourself down when you panic? Cause I panic alll the time 

     consult the panic hand book, which is all about how to panic. read the book, and remember not to do any of those things in the book
